prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_1k7p9f",
  "name": "Jain-Friendly Vegan Weeknight Basics (No-Heat, Affordable Family)",
  "core_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Vegan",
      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Indian",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "NoHeat"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Affordable"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [
      "JainFriendly"
    ],
    "Allergens": []
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Chickpea-Spinach Curry (Jain-Friendly) with Basmati Rice",
  "description": "A mild, onion- and garlic-free chickpea and spinach curry finished with coconut milk. Served with fluffy basmati rice for a quick, family-friendly dinner.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Rinse basmati rice under cold water until it runs clear.",
    "Rinse spinach and roughly chop.",
    "Rinse and drain chickpeas if needed.",
    "Rinse and chop coriander.",
    "Measure crushed tomatoes, coconut milk, spices, oil, salt, and water."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Combine basmati rice, 3 cups water, and a pinch of salt in a pot; bring to a boil, then cover and simmer on low until tender, 12–15 minutes. Rest covered 5 minutes, then fluff.",
    "Heat sunflower oil in a pan on medium. Add cumin seeds and toast until fragrant, about 30 seconds.",
    "Stir in crushed tomatoes, turmeric, and salt; simmer 4–5 minutes to reduce slightly.",
    "Add coconut milk and chickpeas; simmer 5–7 minutes, stirring occasionally.",
    "Fold in spinach and cook until wilted and tender, 2–3 minutes.",
    "Stir in garam masala and adjust salt to taste.",
    "Serve curry over basmati rice and top with coriander."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "basmati rice",
      "quantity": "1.5 cups",
      "preparation": "rinsed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "water",
      "quantity": "3 cups",
      "preparation": "for rice"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "sunflower oil",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cumin seeds",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "crushed tomatoes",
      "quantity": "1.5 cups"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "turmeric",
      "quantity": "1/2 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon, or to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "coconut milk",
      "quantity": "1 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chickpeas",
      "quantity": "2.5 cups",
      "preparation": "rinsed and drained if canned"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spinach",
      "quantity": "200 g",
      "preparation": "roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garam masala",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "coriander",
      "quantity": "1/4 cup",
      "preparation": "chopped"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "HighProtein",
      "Vegan"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Indian",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "NoHeat"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [
      "JainFriendly"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Affordable"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
